natural_language: Show me users who have groups in Apache DS
sql:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    i.firstname, 
    i.lastname, 
    i.displayname, 
    i.email,
    ie.value as groups_value,
    a.name as application_name
FROM spt_identity_entitlement ie
JOIN spt_identity i ON ie.identity_id = i.id
JOIN spt_application a ON ie.application = a.id
WHERE a.name = 'Apache DS' 
  AND ie.name = 'groups'
ORDER BY i.lastname, i.firstname;
explanation: Basic query to find users with groups in Apache DS application

natural_language: Find users with specific groups value in Apache DS
sql:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    i.firstname, 
    i.lastname, 
    i.displayname, 
    i.email,
    ie.value as groups_value
FROM spt_identity_entitlement ie
JOIN spt_identity i ON ie.identity_id = i.id
JOIN spt_application a ON ie.application = a.id
WHERE a.name = 'Apache DS' 
  AND ie.name = 'groups'
  AND ie.value = 'SpecificValue'
ORDER BY i.lastname, i.firstname;
explanation: Query to find users with specific groups value in Apache DS

natural_language: How many users have groups in Apache DS
sql:
SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT i.id) as user_count,
    ie.name as entitlement_type,
    a.name as application_name
FROM spt_identity_entitlement ie
JOIN spt_identity i ON ie.identity_id = i.id
JOIN spt_application a ON ie.application = a.id
WHERE a.name = 'Apache DS' 
  AND ie.name = 'groups'
GROUP BY ie.name, a.name;
explanation: Count query for users with groups in Apache DS

natural_language: Show users who have groups in Apache DS and other applications
sql:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    i.firstname, 
    i.lastname, 
    i.displayname, 
    i.email,
    ie.value as groups_value,
    a.name as application_name
FROM spt_identity_entitlement ie
JOIN spt_identity i ON ie.identity_id = i.id
JOIN spt_application a ON ie.application = a.id
WHERE ie.name = 'groups'
  AND a.name IN ('Apache DS', 'OtherApp1', 'OtherApp2')
ORDER BY a.name, i.lastname, i.firstname;
explanation: Multi-application query for groups including Apache DS

natural_language: Show users with groups in Apache DS and their managers
sql:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    i.firstname, 
    i.lastname, 
    i.displayname, 
    i.email,
    ie.value as groups_value,
    m.displayname as manager_name,
    a.name as application_name
FROM spt_identity_entitlement ie
JOIN spt_identity i ON ie.identity_id = i.id
JOIN spt_application a ON ie.application = a.id
LEFT JOIN spt_identity m ON i.manager = m.id
WHERE a.name = 'Apache DS' 
  AND ie.name = 'groups'
ORDER BY i.lastname, i.firstname;
explanation: Query with manager information for users with groups in Apache DS
